statements: DELETE FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Not Compliant';
DELETE FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Not Compliant' AND date_last_checked < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE id = 1 AND compliance_status = 'Not Compliant'
DELETE FROM environmental_policies WHERE compliance_level = 'High' AND policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM environmental_policies WHERE policy_name = 'Recycling Policy')
DELETE FROM violations WHERE project_id = 1 AND violation_id = 3;
DELETE FROM compliance_logs WHERE project_id = 123 AND action_taken = 'Violation';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = false;
DELETE FROM penalties WHERE project_id = 100 AND penalty_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM penalties WHERE project_id = 3 AND penalty_amount > 1000;
